column3: Having a difficult time in tech. Was asked to leave. Ran into bathroom. Returned to class. Climbing in stairwell. Support called. Escorted to time out.

column4: became angry and started kicking and throwing items. Walked into time out to calm.
very escalated. Throwing items. Support called. Attempted to hit staff with items. Escorted to timeout

threw stick at cars. He was escorted to time out. Continued to escalate while ripping off his socks. Went into calming room tipped over a desk and broke it and removed screw for light switch. Support called.
